name: I wanna get fired
description:
Megastrons#9319/ Programador

Nexuszin#8140/ Artista

guigagliardo#8694/ Sonoplasta

The game is about an employee who wants to talk to the boss himself to get fired

Each death is a different map, until you try all the possibilities

The loading could take a while

Move with WASD

Interact with "E"

Shot paper balls with"Left_click"

Hit your enemies with"space"

Exit the game pressing "ESC"
